attributes.review: this app took a full month to download and i have amazing internet. when it finally downloaded i opened it and donald trump had a video of him have sexual intercourse with a child on the screen. the child looked to be about 10 years of age and was in pain not from trump though. she was in pain because she had to look at his face she was not even phased by his 1 millimeter pp. after i got that video down i looked through the app and it started playing some sort of country music and all of these redneck hicks came to my house with their shotguns and all of the cops came with them and they started shouting all of my friends that were black. donald trump even came and he said “good job guys let’s go kill all of the black people and get all of the mexicans out of this country but instead of a wall let’s kill them. i want to be a worse leader than hitler himself” then they went back to the white house and they called on the government and they started killing all of the black people and when they were done killing for the day they went back to the white house and acted like nothing happened.
attributes.title: the worst app to ever exist.

the app took two and a half hours to download onto my phone and when i could finally go onto the app it would just load then kick me off the app. when i was finally able to get onto the app it asked a lot of personally questions that i didn’t want to answer and it didn’t give you any other choice besides answering the questions. when my friend downloaded it he answered all the questions and it ended up stealing his information and someone stole his identity so... the app is a -100/10
attributes.title: horrible app

attributes.review: This was a ride. The beginning wasn't really eventful other than him ignoring police brutality and people in cages like animals, but nothing much. (minus asking russia to interfere in the elections) It kinda just dragged on slowly, a few rape allegations here and there and tons of lies, like a soap opera. The last part was an absolute joke. The world started crumbling into chaos, and even though there was a known deadly virus that turned into a pandemic in January, the country wasnt closed until March! Overall, not a really good plot, very confusing and chaotic. 0/10 would not do it again.
attributes.title: Would not president again

attributes.review: Honestly what kind of fake news build a wall racist butt hurt orange man is this. Honestly I would be Helen Keller right now just so I don’t have to listen or see this guy ever again. How can he be able to run the country in the ground and still have supporters.
attributes.title: Ew

And to think I was going to consider becoming a redneck republican. Shame on me. I must have been brainwashed by the horrible app!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
